==========
TermCaptor
==========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/termcaptor.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/termcaptor

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/RexWzh/termcaptor.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/RexWzh/termcaptor

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/termcaptor/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://termcaptor.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Record terminal sessions as SVG animations or GIF animations


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://termcaptor.readthedocs.io.
